c1.q1: Do all requirements have Acceptance Criteria?
c1.q2: Have at least 40% of Requirements been Risk Assessed (RRA) for Testing?

c2.q1: Does Acceptance criteria include functional and non-functional test types?
c2.q2: Have at least 75% of Requirements been Risk Assessed for Testing?

c3.q1: Is functional testing planned in sprints more than out of sprint?
c3.q2: Have all Requirements been Risk Assessed for Testing?

c1.q1: Has a Test Approach (Tribe) been completed & agreed with stakeholders?

c2.q1: Was at least 60% of testing done in Sprints?

c3.q1: Was at least 80% of testing done in Sprints?

c1.q1: Is UT automated and triggered from build at least 30%?
c1.q2: Is frequency of Builds at least fortnightly?

c2.q1: Is UT automated and triggered from build more than 50%?
c2.q2: Is frequency of Builds at least weekly?

c3.q1: Is UT automated and triggered from build at least 90%?
c3.q2: Is frequency of Builds at least daily?

c1.q1: Is the frequency of Production deployments < 3 months?

c2.q1: Is the frequency of Production deployments < 8 weeks?

c3.q1: Is the frequency of Production deployments < 4 weeks?
